metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16135 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libssh 0.9.4 has a NULL pointer dereference in tftpserver.c if ssh_buffer_new returns NULL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16135` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssh-4 - 0.9.3-2ubuntu2.1
libssh-gcrypt-4 - 0.9.3-2ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libssh package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.3-2ubuntu2.1').
